content.question: Isotta Nogarola’s publication of her challenge to Ludovico Foscarini best illustrates which of the following developments of the Italian Renaissance?

choices.label: The growth of mass print as a result of the invention of the printing press
Women adapting humanist approaches to advocate for better treatment in society
Women’s exclusion from positions of authority in the Catholic Church
The growing challenge to the institutional power of universities

content.answer: Women adapting humanist approaches to advocate for better treatment in society

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
